SELECT S.NAME, S.SCORE, G.GRADE FROM STUDENTSCORE S, GRADES G WHERE S.SCORE BETWEEN G.LOSCORE AND G.HISCORE;

SCORE=#{score},
WHERE NAME=#{Name}
